title: Thread
description: This schema defines the Thread entity. A Thread is a collection of posts made by the users. The first post that starts a thread is **about** a data asset **from** a user. Other users can respond to this post by creating new posts in the thread. Note that bot users can also interact with a thread. A post can contains links that mention Users or other Data Assets.

taskDetails.description: Details about the task. This is only applicable if thread is of type task.

id.description: Unique identifier that identifies the task.

assignees.description: List of users or teams the task is assigned to

closedBy.description: The user that closed the task.

closedAt.description: Timestamp when the task was closed in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

oldValue.description: The value of old object for which the task is created.

suggestion.description: The suggestion object to replace the old value for which the task is created.

newValue.description: The new value object that was accepted to complete the task.

testCaseResolutionStatusId.description: The test case resolution status id for which the task is created.

announcementDetails.description: Details about the announcement. This is only applicable if thread is of type announcement.

description.description: Announcement description in Markdown format. See markdown support for more details.

startTime.description: Timestamp of the start time from when the announcement should be shown.

endTime.description: Timestamp of when the announcement should end

chatbotDetails.description: Details about the Chatbot conversation. This is only applicable if thread is of type Chatbot.

query.description: The query being discussed with the Chatbot

id.description: Unique identifier that identifies the post.

message.description: Message in Markdown format. See Markdown support for more details.

postTs.description: Timestamp of the post in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

from.description: Name of the User posting the message.

id.description: Unique identifier that identifies an entity instance.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

threadTs.description: Timestamp of the first post created the thread in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

about.description: Data asset about which this thread is created for with format <#E::{entities}::{entityName}::{field}::{fieldValue}.

entityRef.description: Reference to the entity in `about` that the thread belongs to.

entityUrlLink.description: Link to the entity in `about` that the thread belongs to.

generatedBy.description: User or team that generated the thread.

fieldOperation.description: Operation on thread, whether the field was added, or updated or deleted.

feedInfo.description: Entity Id of the entity in `about` that the thread belongs to.

fieldName.description: Field Name message for the feed.

addressedTo.description: User or team this thread is addressed to in format <#E::{entities}::{entityName}::{field}::{fieldValue}.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

resolved.description: When `true` indicates the thread has been resolved.

message.description: The main message of the thread in Markdown format.

postsCount.description: The total count of posts in the thread.

task.description: Details about the task. This is only applicable if thread is of type task.

announcement.description: Details about the announcement. This is only applicable if thread is of type announcement.

chatbot.description: Details about the Chatbot conversation. This is only applicable if thread is of type Chatbot.
